snippet.title: Police interview driver that hit Coast school boy
snippet.content: UPDATE: POLICE are currently talking to the driver of a car that struck a Coast school boy this afternoon. The 10-year-old boy was hit out the front of Buddina State School about 3pm this afternoon and was transported to the Sunshine Coast University Hospital in a stable condition with minor injuries. No further information is known at this time. BREAKING: A CHILD has been taken to hospital after being hit by a car while leaving school. The 10-year-old boy was struck out the front of Buddina State School about 3pm this afternoon and was taken to hospital with minor injuries. Two ambulance crews were on scene to transport the boy to Sunshine Coast University Hospital. No details are available about the driver at this stage. More to come.
